title: Vaidoorya & Kundan Haar: An Enchanting Emerald and Ruby Necklace
materials: Cabochon Ruby Pendant. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: A contemporary take on the classic Haar. This necklace showcases a stunning arrangement of oval-shaped Zambian emeralds, each nestled within a delicate Polki diamond (Kundan) surround. The floral motif, reminiscent of traditional South Indian 'poola jada', adds a touch of femininity. A striking teardrop cabochon ruby pendant, also surrounded by Polki diamonds, completes this piece. The setting is expertly crafted for durability and optimal gemstone visibility.
colors: and Gold with shimmering Polki diamonds.
occasions: and special occasions. This piece adds a touch of regal elegance to both traditional and contemporary attire.
description: This exquisite Haar seamlessly blends tradition with contemporary aesthetics. The Zambian Emeralds, known for their vibrant color, are paired with the timeless charm of Polki diamonds, creating a statement piece that's both elegant and eye-catching. The high-quality craftsmanship ensures durability, making it a treasured heirloom for generations. Its the perfect statement piece for someone to elevate their wedding day look.
